basics.name: Lukas Moroz
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

work.summary: Server at a fast-paced and highly acclaimed restaurant in Waikiki Beach
highlights: Collaborate with coworkers to accurately seat and run food to an average of 150 tables per shift
Maintain an average of 35 tables per shift with a tip percentage of 20%

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
